name: "Me Salvaste" (You saved me)
description:
An entry made in 72h for Gift Jam. GameMaker Studio 2 was used for this project.

In-game texts are only in Spanish, but there is a txt file inside the Zip translating them in case anybody is interested.

Based on a true story.

--How to play --

Use the left and right keys to guide her towards him. Use the space bar to destroy the barriers.
